job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: Role Infra DevOps engineerbrLocation Morrisville NC remote till covidbrMode ContractbrbrDetailed Job descriptionbr	Minimum 5 years as an Infrastructure DevOps or automation engineerbr	Proficient in server side scriptingbr	Knowledge of DevOps capabilities such as Continuous Integration and Delivery CICD Automated Testing etcbr	Knowledge on Terraform is must preferably in Azurebr	Good exposure on Micro services architecture and their deployment in cloud world Especially Azure Terraformbr	Should have worked on setting up  troubleshooting Kubernetes Clusters in Production ready environmentbr	Help teams in migration from monolithic application to Micro services using containerization solutions Docker Kubernetesbr	Worked on onboarding Micro services MiddlewareUI components using DevOps technique  look for improvementsbr	Prior experience in automating CICD process platform services using open source toolsbrbrjerrinsmartitframecom
